name: Paul SATTERFIELD, Appellant v. PA DEPT. OF CORRECTIONS and John E. Wetzel, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Satterfield v. Pa Dept. of Corrections

parties: Paul SATTERFIELD, Appellant v. PA DEPT. OF CORRECTIONS and John E. Wetzel, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of December, 2012, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
57 A.3d 644
Paul SATTERFIELD, Appellant v. PA DEPT. OF CORRECTIONS and John E. Wetzel, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 17, 2012.
